title: Number of professionals at the leading accounting firms in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Accounting firm in the x axis and Number of professionals in the y axis.
The Number of professionals is highest at Accounting firm Deloitte and lowest at Accounting firm Mazars USA.
The difference of Number of professionals between the highest and lowest Accounting firm is 73254.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Accounting firm in the x axis and Number of professionals in the y axis.
The Number of professionals is appeared to be the highest at Accounting firm Deloitte and lowest at Accounting firm Mazars USA.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Accounting firm in the x axis and Number of professionals in the y axis.
The Number of professionals is highest at Accounting firm Deloitte and lowest at Accounting firm Mazars USA.
The difference of Number of professionals between the highest and lowest Accounting firm is 73254.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 25 columns on the x axis representing Accounting firm, and Number of professionals in each Accounting firm on the y axis.
Accounting firm Deloitte has the highest Number of professionals and Mazars USA has the lowest Number of professionals.
Second maximum Number of professionals is found at Accounting firm PwC.
The Number of professionals of Accounting firm Deloitte is 122.89% larger than the minimum value at Mazars USA.
Number of professionals at Accounting firm Deloitte is 73855.0 , second place is PwC at 35350.0, and thirdly is Ernst & Young at 33600.0.
The highest value 73855.0 at Deloitte is almost 8.46 times larger than the average value 8725.4.
The Number of professionals is 218135.0 if we add up values of all Accounting firms.
